info.name: Cisco Umbrella
info.description:
Umbrella has 3 completely separate APIs, with individual documentation.
They also use different authentication/authorization schemes. See
each folder for the relevant documentation link. Main login:
https://login.umbrella.com

General reference:
https://docs.umbrella.com/umbrella-api/reference
